thread.title: Tilly’s, Inc. to Report Fiscal 2018 First Quarter Results on May 30, 2018

author: cnbc.com
title: Tilly’s, Inc. to Report Fiscal 2018 First Quarter Results on May 30, 2018
text:
IRVINE, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Tilly’s, Inc. (NYSE:TLYS) today announced that the company will release its financial results for the first quarter of fiscal 2018 ending May 5, 2018, after the market close on Wednesday, May 30, 2018. Edmond Thomas, President and Chief Executive Officer, and Michael Henry, Chief Financial Officer, will host a conference call that afternoon (May 30, 2018) at 4:30 p.m. ET (1:30 p.m. PT) to discuss the financial results.
Investors and analysts interested in participating in the call are invited to dial (877) 407-4018 at 4:25 p.m. ET (1:25 p.m. PT). The conference call will also be available to interested parties through a live webcast at www.tillys.com . Please visit the website and select the “Investor Relations” link at least 15 minutes prior to the start of the call to register and download any necessary software.
A telephone replay of the call will be available until June 13, 2018, by dialing (844) 512-2921 (domestic) or (412) 317-6671 (international) and entering the conference identification number: 13679539. Please note participants must enter the conference identification number in order to access the replay.
About Tillys
Tillys is a leading specialty retailer of casual apparel, footwear and accessories for young men, young women, boys and girls with an extensive assortment of iconic global, emerging and proprietary brands rooted in an active and outdoor lifestyle. Tillys is headquartered in Irvine, California and currently operates 222 stores (inclusive of 3 RSQ-branded pop-up stores) and its website, www.tillys.com .
